titles.title: Congratulating Mark McGwire of the St. Louis Cardinals for breaking the Major League Baseball single-season home run record.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Mr. Mica asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.
DEBATE - Mr. Mica asked unanimous consent that debate be limited to forty minutes, equally divided and controlled. Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/9/1998--Introduced. Congratulates and commends St. Louis Cardinal Mark McGwire for setting a new Major League Baseball single-season home run record.
